Um jogo que marcou época, ele trás a mecânica e seleção de classes do CS, com um estilo de conquista se passando na segunda guerra. o objetivo é simples, basta conquistar e defender em uma partida multijogador. 
Exemplo: conquista a bandeira 1 e 2. o outro time vai tentar capturar elas de você então você tem que defender. 
O jogo se passa na maior parte em batalha de encontro, o time do eixo de um lado, e o dos aliados do outro.  próxima da base sempre vai ter uma bandeira, as restantes serão neutras. para conquistar você terá que se locomover pelo mapa. mas a outra equipe terá que fazer o mesmo, nesse momento em que as duas equipes se encontram e o tiroteio começa. muitas  vezes para capturar uma bandeira precisará de 2 jogadores, então trabalhar em equipe é fundamental. melhor método é enquanto os membros do seu time estiver capturando, você e os outros cobrir os arredores para neutralizar o inimigo invasor. caso tenha mais bandeiras capturadas que o time adversário, o melhor é proteger as suas bandeiras impedindo a captura pelo inimigo. a mesma regra se aplica caso esteja na desvantagem, o melhor é proteger impedindo deles marcarem mais pontos por captura. 
Caso uma equipe capture todas as bandeiras(geralmente 4) ela vence a rodada e recebe uma pontuação bônus. quando o tempo termina os pontos de captura e de eliminações são somados, a equipe que tiver a maior pontuação saíra vitoriosa. 

[b]O jogo foi testado nas seguintes configurações[/b]
[b]SO: Ubuntu 18.04 LTS 64 bits[/b]
[b]Kernel: 4.15.0-54[/b] 
[b]CPU: Pentium Dual-Core E5300[/b] 
[b]GPU: Intel(R) G41 128 MB[/b] 
[b]RAM: DDR3 8 GB(2x4 1600 mhz)[/b]
[b]DE: XFCE[/b]
[b]WM: Openbox[/b]

Day of Defeat is one of the modes which were made for Half-Life and its reallly similar to Counter-Strike . It is simple game which is based on WORLD WAR 2 and it is made with the same engine as all old games from Valve . When we compare this  game to another FPS games from the same developers , we can see and feel the difference in the gameplay . Playing it feels a little bit unique because of the gunplay and movement and other element as the stamina of your character . 

It is nice multiplayer game which I recommend to every FPS player but the entire community and servers are very poor so when you want to have some great vanilla experience , It is very hard to get to it .

Honestly, is something like this even needed anymore?

PROS: The game still has that classic FPS feel.  You can still feel all the inspiration the game pulled from the Half Life engine to help it run.  The sounds, backgrounds, and overall play is complete here.

CONS:  The game does feel very dated, and can be a little difficult to get the feel of the movement.  Everything is a little stiff.  On top of that, the community is all but dead for this game.

FINAL: The question posed above really does hang over the game as a whole.  Day of Defeat has been completed outdated with the release of Day of Defeat: Source, giving little reason to come back to this.  Due to that, and the mostly dead community, I really can't recommend this game.

Not bad for a project that started out in a college dorm. Had massive fun playing this game back in my youth. The sound of bullets whizzing past your ear or slamming into some nearby surface was disturbingly realistic. Getting into a game was incredibly easy, and the action draws you in like a real war movie. Once you went online, the adrenaline rush is unsurpassed. The sense of satisfaction you felt in taking a crucial victory location or taking out four enemies in a row simply couldn't be beat. This game started the World War online FPS genre. Valve is horrible at making new games which is a shame. They were ahead of the curve and lost because they refused to produce any new games under the Day of Defeat franchise.
Satisfying in its day but no reason to return. The mechanics and atmosphere are surprisingly strong. It's a shame there's no single player campaign to warrant remembrance.

Cкажу так,Day of Defeat source просто лютое говно по сравнению со старшим братом. Здесь нет "реалистичной" стрельбы как в source,нет крутого графона, но зато есть много чего нет в DoD source
1.Много классов. Их тут реально очень много, аж целых 8-9 штук, при том что в DoD source всего 6 и то ограничены.
2.Атмосфера. Темные тона, фоновые звуки стрельбы и более красивые взрывы очень хорошо передают атмосферу Второй мировой войны.
3.Британия. Да да, в классической DoD вы можете поиграть еще и за Британию. (В source только Америка и Германия)
4.Стрельба. В DoD source чтобы попасть по человеку во время стрельбы приходится очень сильно оттаскивать мышь назад ибо отдача просто нереальная. В классике же все намного проще.
Вывод: Раньше было лучше

For the small amount of money you'll pay for this game, when on sale, this multiplayer first person shooter is pretty good. Don't expect recoil to be accurate to real life in any way. Also the community is kinda weird in my opinion, but servers are usually pretty full depending what time of day. Back to the weird community, rules are usually heavy on some servers, people freak out when you shoot in spawn, or curse you out if you don't change your default name 'player' quick enough, but other servers have like few rules to enforce. Otherwise game is worth the while, bit frustrating to get used to at first...maybe.
